parameters.description: String to search

parameters.name: _sort
parameters.description: Use ASC value to sort ascending or DESC value to sort descending.

responses.description: Wildcard queries temporarily blocked due to excessive usage. Consider adjusting your code to remove them or reduce the rate of search requests with wildcards (*). This temporary block may also be due to excessive use of requests with the parameter `keyword`.
